Headline: #N4 Cottage Grove Temporary Reroute near Madison/Wabash
ShortDescription: #N4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Madison/Wabash.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#N4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Madison/Wabash.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus (Layover).

Southbound buses will operate via Columbus, South Water, Michigan, then resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
